html:
Moment please remain
A moment that is crystal clear
Letâ€™s stay then please
Between the clock hands
When we are together
And when the sun shines
Or the moon gladly
Shows up on night sky
The crystal clear moment
One of those you seek
One of those that
Make you simply happy
Time shows no mercy
Moments pass fast
Then you have to wait
Or hurry for them again
title: Moment
